column4: Hey there. I'm upgrading to 7.04. I had assumed I was on the latest-but-one version, but it turned out that Dapper (which I currently have) was succeeded by Edgy. I missed that entire release cycle. In the future, where can I find out about Ubuntu releases? Is there a mailing list?
you can't really miss them if you zake the release cycle into account... every 6 months
Huffalump: sure, but Edgy was 4 months after Dapper.
